definition: between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: A wet dream is also known as a nocturnal emission.
sentences.chinese: 溼夢也被認爲是夜間遺精。

sentences.english: Reflect in the night, put on the table a glass of warm milk.
sentences.chinese: 體現在夜間，擺放在桌前那一杯溫熱的牛奶。

sentences.english: Moisture in the atmosphere condensed into dew during the night.
sentences.chinese: 大氣中的水分在夜間凝結成露珠。

sentences.english: In addition, we proceed to the data synchronism and butt jointing in nighttime.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我們選擇在夜間進行數據對接和同步。

sentences.english: It's possible that nightly nicotine withdrawal could be causing you to toss and turn.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因爲尼古丁的殘留物在夜間會使你輾轉反側。

sentences.english: Tropical summers of 24hr sunlight are replaced by freezing winters of continuous night.
sentences.chinese: 到了冬季，夏季不斷的酷熱被連續的夜間嚴寒所代。

sentences.english: What happened is that a group of Jihadists managed to infiltrate the town over night.
sentences.chinese: 一股聖戰組織成員在夜間得以滲入廷巴克圖。

sentences.english: During the night, somebody had cut the boat loose from its moorings.
sentences.chinese: 有人在夜間砍斷了泊船的纜繩。

sentences.english: I remembered my songs in the night.
sentences.chinese: 我想起我夜間的歌曲，捫心自問。

sentences.english: The temperature will stay above zero in the day-time , but at night it will fall below zero again.
sentences.chinese: 白天氣溫在零度以上，夜間又將降到零度以下。

sentences.english: Soldiers used smoke in the day time and fire at night to deliver the message.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們在白天用烽煙，夜間用篝火傳遞消息。

sentences.english: During the night the rain changed to snow.
The hedgehog only comes out at night to scurry around for a meal.
sentences.chinese: 刺蝟只在夜間出來，到處匆匆地轉，找尋食物。

sentences.english: The students also completed a survey that gauges symptoms of late-night eating disorders.
sentences.chinese: 學生們還完成了一項評測夜間飲食失調症的調查。

sentences.english: With our hectic lifestyles, a night of perfect and comfortable sleep seems like the ultimate reward.
sentences.chinese: 完善的夜間睡眠是對忙碌工作的最佳獎勵。

sentences.english: The nighttime drowsiness problem could partially be caused by my own behavior.
sentences.chinese: 夜間嗜睡問題有可能是由於我自己的習慣。

definition: Yanchang county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
to seal/to close/to confine/to seal off/to close down/sealed/confined/closed/unreceptive
to add to existing facilities or services
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
